comments: Geomtrically, each term of the sequence represents the integer part of the distance between opposite vertices and also edges of even sided polygons, each of which has double the number of sides of the previous, starting with a square of unit length. - _Torlach Rush_, Feb 21 2014
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: a(n) = floor( 1 / tan( pi / 2^(n+1) )). - _Michael Somos_, Feb 24 2014
